cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 510 mi SSE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the central Texas Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Texas coast between Port Mansfield and San Luis Pass (near Port O'Connor)
cyclone.hours_to_offshore: Not applicable (system never approaches the Ohio coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Port Mansfield TX northward to High Island TX (Storm Surge Watch); Boca De Catan MX to Port Mansfield TX and north of San Luis Pass to High Island TX (Tropical Storm Watch); North of Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass TX (Hurricane Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect yet (warnings anticipated for Texas coast by Thursday morning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and southern Texas Gulf Coast, with secondary impacts possible in southwest Louisiana
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: No Ohio or Great Lakes location listed in wind-probability table
